mapper.select: SELECT * FROM( SELECT rownum rnum, C.* FROM ( SELECT MC.commentno, MC.moviebestno as boardno, MC.commenttext, MC.commentdate as wdate, MC.commentdiv, MCL.likecnt FROM moviebestcomment MC, (SELECT commentno,COUNT(*) likecnt FROM moviebestcommentlike GROUP BY commentno )MCL WHERE MC.commentno = MCL.commentno(+) AND id = #{userid} UNION SELECT BC.commentno, BC.bookbestno as boardno, BC.commenttext, BC.commentdate as wdate, BC.commentdiv, BCL.likecnt FROM bookbestcomment BC, (SELECT commentno,COUNT(*) likecnt FROM bookbestcommentlike GROUP BY commentno )BCL WHERE BC.commentno = BCL.commentno(+) AND id = #{userid} UNION SELECT DC.dcno as commentno, DC.dno as boardno, DC.dccontent as commenttext, DC.dcdate as wdate, DC.commentdiv, DCL.likecnt FROM debatecomment DC, (SELECT dcno ,COUNT(*) likecnt FROM debatecommenthot GROUP BY dcno )DCL WHERE DC.dcno = DCL.dcno(+) AND userid = #{userid} ) C ORDER BY wdate DESC )
